name: Out Of Control (HangarSeason)
description:
Press Enter to play.

Objective: Move the cube into the goal position (shown in green).

Use WASD to move. This moves both the selected panel and the cube. The controls change depending on the panel that is selected.

Created for the GMTK GameJam 2020.

Solo project.

The textures on some of the walls were downloaded from https://cc0textures.com/.
